short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KittenProperties Xpath Picker is a browser extension designed for the Chrome web browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KittenProperties Xpath Picker" is a browser extension designed for the Chrome web browser, primarily aimed at developers, QA engineers, and data analysts who frequently work with web data extraction and automated testing. This tool simplifies the process of generating and validating XPath expressions, which are essential for identifying specific elements within web pages
